ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Subject: Re: UPDATE 2 - we're getting there!
ygData.msgSnippet: Our melee class have haste items, our enchanters cast Swift Like the Wind for haste (bard song does not stack) for serious battles. Resolution is good too -
ygData.messageBody:
Our melee class have haste items, our enchanters cast Swift Like the Wind
for haste (bard song does not stack) for serious battles. Resolution is good
too - esp for long fights where stamina loss is a factor. Amazingly, higher
level bard's can use Jig of Vigor to help replace stamina lost by long
fights (or Plane of Sky mobs that cast AE drain stamina.) I would be
interested to see the difference in damage done by the various melee classes
at full stamina vs 50% loss, 75% loss & 90% loss. My gut reaction is that
it is significant. This could be a real nice song to play especially if you
have 3 real tanks in your group and could be helpful at many levels.

Sylly

> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
>
> I like the idea, but 18 seconds? At level 49? Is that really worthwhile?
> Won't most 49+ groups already have haste items for the tanks that this
won't
> help?
